column1: # Consolidated Retail Demand Forecasting and Price Optimization Dataset - Synthetic Data Generated by AI for Demonstration Purposes
# This dataset combines SKU×Store×Week sales data with promotional mechanics
# for use in promo-aware demand forecasting
column3: and revenue optimization. All data is artificial and AI-generated.

column1: # Granularity: SKU×Store×Week level with 104 weeks of history
# competitor_density: Number of competitors within 5 miles
# net_sales: Net sales after returns and allowances ($)
# avg_selling_price: Average selling price per unit ($)
# cost_of_goods: Cost of goods sold per unit ($)
# discount_depth: Percentage discount from regular price (%)
# baseline_demand: Estimated baseline demand without promotions
# incremental_units: Incremental units due to promotion
# inventory_on_hand: Units in inventory at week start
# days_of_supply: Days of supply based on current demand
# market_share: Category market share in store (%)
# halo_effect: Halo effect from complementary products (%)
# advertisement_spend: Weekly advertising spend allocated to SKU ($)
